bibl.title: The Church of Dayr Abu Matta and its Associated Structures: an Overview of Four Seasons of Excavations.
bibl.note: Previous study of the site. - The current project: introduction. - 1. The church. - 2. Excavation within the Northern structures. - 3. Excavation in the west buildings. - Discussion.
